name: TETRIGLITCH
description:
It's time to spin up your neighbor's bootleg copy of your favorite colorful block game! So what if it's got a few glitches... it's still fun... right?

This is a Tetris-like game with some added weirdness. After a certain point, glitches will start appearing that will obscure your view of the grid. Clear lines to remove the glitches. Also - the grid will continually rotate. Clearing lines will change the direction of the rotation... but it will also increase the speed of the rotation.

WASD or arrow keys to move, Space to rotate your pieces.
